messages.content: As your Member of Parliament I won't try to pull the wool over your eyes or say things that aren't true. I want the election to be about real issues. My opponent cannot compete on those and so has chosen to attack my character and reputation in the most disgraceful way.

mentions.tacticalSituation: This seat is not safe and voters have a real say on their MP

images.caption: He has also told you that in the 10 years he has been a member of the council he hasn't claimed a penny in expenses.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet addresses allegations against the candidate about his expenses and claims by his opponent. It emphasizes the importance of focusing on real issues. Steve McCabe describes himself as a hardworking, campaigning MP asking for support. It notes that only Labour or the Tories can win in the Selly Oak constituency, highlighting the tactical situation for voters.
